fields.value: Massachusetts Archives Collection. v.31-Indian, 1705-1750. SC1/series 45X, Petition of Bernard Trott

dsDescriptionValue.value:
Petition subject: Slaves

Original: http://nrs.harvard.edu/urn-3:FHCL:13909003

Date of creation: 16770000

Selected signatures:

  1. Bernard Trott

Actions taken on dates: 1677-06-16,1704-11-07

Legislative action: Order on June 16, 1677 and read on November 7, 1704

Total signatures: 1

Legislative action summary: Order, read

Legal voter signatures (males not identified as non-legal): 1

Female only signatures: No

Prayer format was printed vs. manuscript: Manuscript

Additional archivist notes: Fayal, Indians stolen by Waldron at Eastward, first Indian War, John Leverett, Samuel Turell, Joseph Burrell, Joseph Nash, William Tailor, William Tayler, Captain Hull, Major Gookins, Portugal islands, Danforth, Canarys, Samuel Sewall

Location of the petition at the Massachusetts Archives of the Commonwealth: Massachusetts Archives volume 31, page 5

Acknowledgements: Supported by the National Endowment for the Humanities (PW-5105612), Massachusetts Archives of the Commonwealth, Radcliffe Institute for Advanced Study at Harvard University, Center for American Political Studies at Harvard University, Institutional Development Initiative at Harvard University, and Harvard University Library.
